parameters.name: Timeframe
parameters.description: Set the global time range for all queries below

parameters.name: _severity
parameters.description: parameter to drill down on clicked severity tile
parameters.label: severity

content.query:
datatable (Count: long, status: string, status_count: long) [0, "Compliance", 1, 0, "Informational", 2, 0, "Suspicious", 3, 0, "Critical", 4]
| union
    (
    darktrace_model_alerts_CL
    | where dtProduct_s =="Policy Breach" and modelName_s !contains ("SaaS") and modelName_s !contains ("IaaS")
    | extend ThreatRiskLevel=score_d
    | extend status = case(    
        compliance_b == false and Category == "Critical", "Critical",
        compliance_b == true, "Compliance",
        compliance_b == false and Category == "Suspicious", "Suspicious",
        compliance_b == false and Category == "Informational", "Informational",       
        "True"
        )
    | where status != "True"
    | extend status_count = case(status == "Critical", 4, status == "Suspicious", 3, status == "Informational", 2, 1)
    | summarize Count = count() by status, status_count
    )
| summarize Count=sum(Count) by status, status_count
| sort by status_count asc
content.title: Model Breaches by Category

content.json: _Click on the tiles to view more details (maximum 100 entries displayed)_

content.query:
darktrace_model_alerts_CL
| where dtProduct_s =="Policy Breach" and modelName_s !contains ("SaaS") and modelName_s !contains ("IaaS")
| extend EventCount = 1
| extend EventType = "NetworkSession"
| extend EventSchema = "NetworkSession"
| extend EventSchemaVersion = "0.2.2"
| extend EventResult = "Success"
| extend DvcAction = "Allow"
| project-rename EventSeverity=score_d
| extend EventVendor = "Darktrace"
| extend EventProduct = "Enterprise Immune System"
| project-rename  EventStartTime = breachTime_s
| extend EventEndTime = EventStartTime
| project-rename NetworkRuleName=modelName_s
| project-rename NetworkRuleNumber=pid_d
| extend Rule = "NetworkRuleNumber"
| project-rename ThreatId=threatID_d
| extend ThreatName = NetworkRuleName
| project-rename ThreatCategory=dtProduct_s
| extend ThreatRiskLevel=EventSeverity
| project-rename SrcIpAddr=SourceIP
| project-rename SrcHostname=hostname_s
| project-rename SrcMacAddr=sourceMac_s
| project-rename SrcPortNumber=sourcePort_s
| project-rename DstIpAddr=destIP_s
| project-rename DstPortNumber=destPort_s
| project-rename DstHostname=destHost_s
| project-rename DstMacAddr=destMac_s
| project-rename MitreTechniques=mitreTechniques_s
| project-rename DarktraceLink=breachUrl_s
| where compliance_b == true
| limit 100
| project TimeGenerated, NetworkRuleName, ThreatRiskLevel, ThreatId, DarktraceLink, SrcHostname, SrcIpAddr, DstHostname, DstIpAddr, EventStartTime, MitreTechniques
| sort by TimeGenerated desc

content.query:
darktrace_model_alerts_CL
| where dtProduct_s =="Policy Breach" and modelName_s !contains ("SaaS") and modelName_s !contains ("IaaS")
| project-rename DstIpAddr=destIP_s
| where isnotempty(DstIpAddr) 
| where DstIpAddr !startswith "10"
| where DstIpAddr !startswith "192"
| where DstIpAddr !startswith "172"
| summarize event_count=count() by DstIpAddr
| top 10 by event_count

content.title: Compliance Model Breaches Over Time

parameters.name: _severity
parameters.description: parameter to drill down on clicked severity tile
parameters.label: severity

content.query:
datatable (Count: long, status: string, status_count: long) [0, "Low", 1, 0, "Medium", 2, 0, "High", 3, 0, "Critical", 4]
| union
    (
    darktrace_model_alerts_CL
    | where dtProduct_s =="Policy Breach" and (modelName_s contains ("SaaS") or modelName_s contains ("IaaS"))
    | extend ThreatRiskLevel=score_d
    | extend status = case(    
        ThreatRiskLevel >= 75, "Critical",
        ThreatRiskLevel < 25, "Low",
        ThreatRiskLevel >= 50 and ThreatRiskLevel < 75, "High",
        ThreatRiskLevel >= 25 and ThreatRiskLevel < 50, "Medium",          
        "True"
        )
    | where status != "True"
    | extend status_count = case(status == "Critical", 4, status == "High", 3, status == "Medium", 2, 1)
    | summarize Count = count() by status, status_count
    )
| summarize Count=sum(Count) by status, status_count
| sort by status_count asc
content.title: Model Breaches by Severity

content.json: _Click on the tiles to view more details (maximum 100 entries displayed)_

content.query:
darktrace_model_alerts_CL
| where dtProduct_s =="Policy Breach" and (modelName_s contains ("SaaS") or modelName_s contains ("IaaS"))
| extend EventCount = 1
| extend EventType = "NetworkSession"
| extend EventSchema = "NetworkSession"
| extend EventSchemaVersion = "0.2.2"
| extend EventResult = "Success"
| extend DvcAction = "Allow"
| project-rename EventSeverity=score_d
| extend EventVendor = "Darktrace"
| extend EventProduct = "Enterprise Immune System"
| project-rename  EventStartTime = breachTime_s
| extend EventEndTime = EventStartTime
| project-rename NetworkRuleName=modelName_s
| project-rename NetworkRuleNumber=pid_d
| extend Rule = "NetworkRuleNumber"
| project-rename ThreatId=threatID_d
| extend ThreatName = NetworkRuleName
| project-rename ThreatCategory=dtProduct_s
| extend ThreatRiskLevel=EventSeverity
| project-rename SrcIpAddr=SourceIP
| project-rename SrcHostname=hostname_s
| project-rename SrcMacAddr=sourceMac_s
| project-rename SrcPortNumber=sourcePort_s
| project-rename DstIpAddr=destIP_s
| project-rename DstPortNumber=destPort_s
| project-rename DstHostname=destHost_s
| project-rename DstMacAddr=destMac_s
| extend MitreTechniques=parse_json(mitreTechniques_s)
| project-rename DarktraceLink=breachUrl_s
| where ThreatRiskLevel < 25
| limit 100
| project TimeGenerated, NetworkRuleName, ThreatRiskLevel, ThreatId, DarktraceLink, SrcHostname, SrcIpAddr, DstHostname, DstIpAddr, EventStartTime, MitreTechniques
| sort by TimeGenerated desc

parameters.name: aia_type
parameters.label: AI Analyst Incident Types
parameters.description: Filter out the types of AI Analyst Incidents available.
parameters.value: darktrace_model_alerts_CL | where dtProduct_s =='AI Analyst' | project-rename DtIncidentName=title_s | project-rename DtCurrentGroup=externalId_g | project-rename GroupScore=groupScore_d | project-rename SrcDeviceName=bestDeviceName_s | limit 100 | summarize DtMaxIncidentScore=max(GroupScore), take_any(SrcDeviceName, DtIncidentName) by DtCurrentGroup | project DtMaxIncidentScore, DtIncidentName, SrcDeviceName, DtCurrentGroup

content.query: {aia_type}
content.title: AI Analyst Incidents

content.json: _ Selecting an AI Analyst Incident in the table above will put its corresponding Events in focus below _

content.query:
darktrace_model_alerts_CL
| where dtProduct_s =="AI Analyst"
| project-rename  EventStartTime=startTime_s
| project-rename EventEndTime = endTime_s
| project-rename DtIncidentEventName=title_s
| project-rename DtCurrentGroup=externalId_g //externalId is the Current Group ID from Darktrace 
| project-rename ThreatCategory=dtProduct_s
| extend ThreatRiskLevel=score_d //This is the event score, which is different from the GroupScore
| project-rename SrcHostname=hostname_s
| project-rename DtURL=url_s
| project-rename DtSummary=summary_s
| project-rename DtGroupScore=groupScore_d
| project-rename DtGroupCategory=groupCategory_s
| project-rename SrcDeviceName=bestDeviceName_s
| where DtCurrentGroup contains "{SelectedAIAGroup}"
| limit 100
| project TimeGenerated, DtIncidentEventName, ThreatCategory, ThreatRiskLevel, DtSummary, SrcDeviceName, SrcHostname, DtURL, DtCurrentGroup, DtGroupScore, DtGroupCategory, EventStartTime, EventEndTime
| sort by TimeGenerated desc
content.title: Selected AI Analyst Incident Events

content.query:
darktrace_model_alerts_CL
| where dtProduct_s =="AI Analyst"
| make-series count() default=0 on TimeGenerated in range({Timeframe:start}, now(), {Timeframe:grain})
content.title: Total AI Analyst Incident Events

| extend DtIncidentEventName = title_s

| top 10 by event_count
content.title: Top 10 Most Frequent AI Analyst Incident Events

content.query:
darktrace_model_alerts_CL
| where dtProduct_s == "Antigena Email"
| extend Actions = parse_json(actions_s)
| extend Hold_Email=set_has_element(Actions, "Hold")
| extend Junk_Email=set_has_element(Actions, "Move to Junk")
| extend Lock_Link=set_has_element(Actions, "Lock Link")
| extend Lock_All_Links=set_has_element(Actions, "Lock All Links")
| extend Double_Lock_Link=set_has_element(Actions, "Double Lock Link")
| extend Double_Lock_All_Links=set_has_element(Actions, "Double Lock All Links")
| extend Strip_Attachment=set_has_element(Actions, "Stip Attachment")
| extend Strip_All_Attachments=set_has_element(Actions, "Strip All Attachments")
| extend Convert_Attachment=set_has_element(Actions, "Convert Attachment")
| extend Convert_All_Attachments=set_has_element(Actions, "Convert All Attachments")
| extend Unspoof=set_has_element(Actions, "Unspoof")
| extend XAxis=set_has_element(Actions, "Unspoof")
| summarize XAxis=countif(XAxis == true), Hold_Email=countif(Hold_Email == true), Junk_Email=countif(Junk_Email == true), Lock_Link=countif(Lock_Link == true), Lock_All_Links=countif(Lock_All_Links == true), Double_Lock_Link=countif(Double_Lock_Link == true), Double_Lock_All_Links=countif(Double_Lock_All_Links == true), Convert_Attachment=countif(Convert_Attachment == true), Convert_All_Attachments=countif(Convert_All_Attachments == true), Strip_Attachment=countif(Strip_Attachment == true), Strip_All_Attachments=countif(Strip_All_Attachments == true), Unspoof=countif(Unspoof == true)
content.title: Total Actions Taken

content.query:
darktrace_model_alerts_CL
| where dtProduct_s == "Antigena Email"
| extend Actions = parse_json(actions_s)
| extend Hold_Email=set_has_element(Actions, "Hold")
| where Hold_Email == true 
| extend Recipients=parse_json(recipients_s)
| where Recipients contains "{SearchRecipient}"
| project-rename ThreatRiskLevel=anomaly_score_d
| project-rename AttachmentSHA1s=attachment_sha1s_s
| project-rename Sender=from_s
| project-rename Subject=subject_s
| project-rename Tags=tags_s
| project-rename TimestampUTC=timestamp_t
| project-rename UUID=uuid_s
| project-rename DarktraceLink=url_s
| project-rename Direction=direction_s
| project Subject, Sender, Recipients, ThreatRiskLevel, TimestampUTC, Direction, Tags, AttachmentSHA1s, DarktraceLink, UUID
content.title: Held Emails

content.query:
darktrace_model_alerts_CL
| where dtProduct_s == "Antigena Email"
| where direction_s == "inbound"
| project-rename Sender=from_s
| summarize Count=count() by Sender
| top 10 by Count
content.title: Top 10 Most Frequent External Senders

content.query:
darktrace_model_alerts_CL //anything starting with 'Dt' is not an ASIM mapping 
| where dtProduct_s =="System Alert"
| extend EventVendor = "Darktrace"
| extend EventProduct = "Darktrace DETECT"
| project-rename NetworkRuleName=friendlyName_s
| project-rename ThreatRiskLevel=priority_code_d
| project-rename ThreatRiskCategory=priority_s
| project-rename EventStartTime = time_s
| project-rename SrcIpAddr=deviceIP_s
| project-rename SrcHostname=hostname_s
| project-rename DtStatus=status_s
| project-rename DtURL=url_s
| project-rename DtSeverity=Severity
| project-rename DtName=name_s
| project-rename DtMessage=Message
| project EventVendor, EventProduct, NetworkRuleName, ThreatRiskLevel, ThreatRiskCategory, SrcIpAddr, SrcHostname, DtStatus, DtURL, DtName, DtMessage
